titles: The Welsh-man's letter dedicated to the Duke of Monmouth, and my Lord Gray, and also, to all his friends, concerning this horrid and treasonable plot.
author: Thomas, John, 17th cent.
Monmouth, James Scott, Duke of, 1649-1685.
Tankerville, Forde Grey, Earl of, 1655-1701.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
